alert.note: Alert for Lewis; Oswego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 25 at 1:54AM EDT until July 25 at 2:15AM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 AM EDT FOR LEWIS AND NORTHEASTERN OSWEGO COUNTIES... At 153 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Redfield, or 11 miles northwest of Camden, moving east at 45 mph. A strong to severe thunderstorm was also located near Turin. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Lowville, Redfield, Highmarket, Whetstone Gulf State Park, New Bremen, Watson, Martinsburg, Williamstown, Lyonsdale and Greig. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
